cause.description:
Produces a 15 minute weekday dialogue on Christian living with Sam Horn and Les Ollila, and a weekend half hour of exegetical teaching, heard on over a dozen radio stations and several internet feeds.
1. The Great Commission is important
2. Discipleship is vital
3. Edification is necessary
cause.mission: Help people live a God-centered, Truth-driven Life
cause.name: The Word For Life
